extendedInfo.description: Do you want to have a custom App created just for you?Do you have an idea in mind for an App that you want to become it real?Saw an App in AppStore but still is not available in Google Androidâ¢ Market?Then "AppRequest for Androidâ¢ is definitely for you...Now you can request an App with features that wish. If we publish such App you will be able to purchase it and receive a 100% refund and lifetime updates!

reviews.title: This is good, but what we really want is a \"SUGGESTION BOX\"
reviews.comment: Please enable us, the users, to propose improvements to Apps, or something new.
reviews.author: Raoul Soibelmann

reviews.comment: Cool app. It is like having for own android developer on demand!
reviews.author: A Google User
